articles.author: Brittany Carter
articles.title: The chicken or the egg argument in women's sport: why investment first equals revenue later
articles.description: Recent studies show corporate sponsorship in women's elite sports isn't just a gesture, it's a savvy investment — as the Australian women's cricket team shows.
articles.content:
"Don't read the comments" is common advice shared among women's sports fans when equal pay or major investment is announced for female athletes.
It's here you'll often find the naysayers critiquing … [+13197 chars]

articles.title: News24 | India's Pant says doctors considered leg amputation after car crash
articles.description: Star Indian wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant says that doctors raised the prospect of amputating his leg after the serious car crash that threatened to end his cricket career.
articles.content: Star Indian wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant says that doctors raised the prospect of amputating his leg after the serious car crash that threatened to end his cricket career.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
